column7: with her family at her side. shirley was born on the family farm on february 28
column8: 1922 the daughter of albert john and agnes (neve) long. shirley worked for many years at the mauston garment factory and at swiss colony. shirley truly loved her family and enjoyed spending time with her children and their families. she enjoyed her friday night fish fries with her daughter sherry and husband phil. her sunday afternoon chinese luncheons with her dear friend vivian were always a highlight. shirley is survived by her children sherry (phillip) czajka
column13: 19 great grandchildren and 12 great great grandchildren and dear friend vivian dagnan. she was preceded in death by her husband victor ""bub"" wells and a son victor gary wells. funeral service will be held at 11:30 a. m.
column17: mauston where friends may call from 10:00 a. m. until time of service. pastor jeff fairchild will officiate. burial will be at the mauston cemetery.
